content: The new mismatched types diagnostic is :fire: Kudos!
How do you deal with it only working in the open files?

I mean, that's the feature.

IDE error are only for the piece of code you are working at right now. Once you've finished immediate codding, you build the project with (rust-analyzer: run), and then brings you to the list of global errors
I don't even remember what other IDEs do :grimacing:.
